title: T332 Helmar stamp glassine MOVED to Live auction thread
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T332 Helmar stamp glassine MOVED to Live auction thread
posts.post_content:
Offered for sale is one of the glassines that T332 Helmar stamps(along with actresses and misc foreign stamps) were issued in. Nice condition for these fragile nearly 100 year old items.

Moved to Live auction thread

Scott
